channel.title: I need an expirienced hoster!
channel.description: well my step dad wont let me host the server here so i need someone to host it for me. The host can be an admin, but i want to be an admin too! i need someone who knows how to host and can host alot. i cant guarentee that i can be on 24/7. i will send my server files through msn.

item.title: I need an expirienced hoster!
item.dc:creator: @reaper7653 reaper7653
item.description:
@reaper7653 wrote:

ok i cant be back on the computer til monday but sure if you wanna host 24/7 its fine with me. its a got-skillz source. which is an awesome pvp server.
